interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beauty Bakerie Lip Whip Liquid Metallic Lipstick, Long Lasting Lip Color, Smudge Proof Makeup, Berried, 3.5 mL
Review Date: 2022/07/27
Store: Beauty Bakerie
Product Description: ['Beauty Bakerie Berried metallic Lip whip is a metallic red liquid lipstick with hints of deep purple. It is long-lasting, smudge-proof and waterproof. Glides smoothly over lips, It is a weightless and non-sticky texture.']
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Beauty Bakerie', 'Color': 'Berried', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.59 x 3.54 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': '754680458186', 'UPC': '754680458186', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Bakerie Cosmetics Brand'}
Review Text: Super pigmented, when dried. It stays put and will go no where. It comes off with regular methods, just alot harder then a oil based remover. I highly recommend for the staying power !!
Review Title: Will stay put after drying!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

PRETTIEST
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'PRETTIEST', 'Package Dimensions': '11.5 x 8.54 x 2.05 inches; 7.44 Ounces', 'UPC': '778862790109'}

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Enjoys long, wavy, and curly synthetic wigs in modern styles with vibrant colors, and has recently shown interest in high-quality cosmetic products that enhance their appearance.
- **Quality Expectations:** Seeks good value for price, appreciating thickness and durability in wigs. Values longevity and ease of use in makeup, noting the importance of smudge-proof and long-lasting products in their recent purchase.
- **Purchase Behavior:** Tends to buy products that provide a positive initial experience, often expressing strong satisfaction and ready to purchase multiples when pleased. Demonstrates an openness to explore related beauty products outside their primary category.
- **Reviewing Style:** Expresses genuine affection for products, highlighting specific attributes like texture, effectiveness, and ease of application. Utilizes enthusiastic language and positive reinforcement in reviews, showcasing a strong sense of satisfaction with purchases.
- **Trend Awareness:** Likely to take advantage of sales or promotions, remaining proactive in keeping up-to-date with product releases and availability, both in wigs and cosmetics.

Overall, the user appears to prioritize quality, value, and aesthetic appeal across categories, alongside a positive and enthusiastic approach to sharing their experiences. Their recent interaction indicates a keen interest in beauty trends and long-lasting products, complementing their established preferences.
